Thanks for this feedback.  As you can imagine, it's quite an undertaking to do all this. We tested it in stages.  We were on a serious time crunch though.  I built the tornado first, then tested all the different accelerant possibilities until I found the ideal one.  Then we tested different flow rates on the vacuum.... etc etc.  The whole process to perfect it took us about 5 hours.  If you look at some of my older videos you can tell I've been doing lots of these things for years.
